file.name: Internationale Iron and Steel Institute
file.comment: You'll find a broad range of factual data, statistics and background information on the steel industry worldwide, including data showing trends in steel production and other economic indicators, information on aspects of steelmaking, markets and applications, environmental issues, etc. The site also contains sections on stainless steel and ISSF, sections on news of IISI members, steel-related links and events, and IISI publications and general information including a description of IISI.

file.name: Talsperrenleitzentrale Ruhrverband
file.comment: Der Ruhrverband ist zuständig für die Steuerung der Talsperren im Einzugsgebiet der Ruhr und betreibt aus diesem Grund eine Talsperrenleitzentrale in Essen. Das Talsperrensystem dient im Wesentlichen der Niedrigwasseraufhöhung zur Aufrechterhaltung der Wasserversorgung in Zeiten mit geringem natürlichen Abfluss und dem Hochwasserschutz durch Bewirtschaftung der in den Wintermonaten vorgeschriebenen Hochwasserschutzräume.

file.name: Gene Logic - Moving Drug Discovery into the Information Age
Elan
file.comment: Elan Corporation is a neuroscience-based biotechnology company that is focused on discovering, developing, manufacturing and marketing advanced therapies in neurology, autoimmune diseases, and severe pain. In neurology, Elan is focused on building upon its breakthrough research and extensive experience in the area of neuropathology-based disorders. In autoimmune diseases, Elans primary emphasis is studying and developing ways to provide disease-modifying therapies for a wide range of autoimmune diseases. Products in mid- or late-stage development include Antegren (natalizumab), being developed in collaboration with Biogen Idec for multiple sclerosis, Crohns disease and rheumatoid arthritis. In severe pain, Elans research efforts focus on inflammatory and neuropathic pain, and products in late-stage development include Prialt (ziconotide), for severe pain.

file.name: ARCHOS
file.comment: ARCHOS hat sich als Entwickler und Hersteller einer branchenweit einzigartigen Serie von Kleinstperipheriegeräten für den mobilen Einsatz etabliert. ARCHOS hat seinen Schwerpunkt auf Mobilen Peripheriegeräten zur Datenspeicherung, MP3-Audio, Digitalfotos und -videos, Zubehör.

The Network for the Water Business and Water Economy

Berkeley Research Associate, National Bureau of Economic Research Co-Editor, Journal of Economic Perspectives Columnist, Wired Columnist, Project Syndicate. He started out with a webpage, over time he found that he was doing a "thought of the week," then shifted to doing a "semi-weekly journal," and now here he is......

file.name: Bureau of Economic Analysis
file.comment: The Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) promotes a better understanding of the U.S. economy by providing timely, relevant, and accurate economic data.

file.name: Center for International Comparison
file.comment: The Center for International Comparisons at the Pennsylvania State University is the main site for the Penn World Tables, a national accounts economic time series covering many countries. Its expenditure entries are denominated in a common set of prices in a common currency so that real quantity comparisons can be made, both between countries and over time.

file.name: CountryData.com
file.comment: Since 1979 the Political Risk Service (PRS) has committed its extensive resources to providing up-to-date country information for international business.

file.name: Deutsche Bundesbank
file.comment: Die Monatsberichte, statistischen Daten und Informationen der Fachbereiche der Bundesbank sowie die deutschsprachigen Veröffentlichungen der Europäischen Zentralbank sind zentrale Bestandteile des Online-Angebots.

file.name: EconPapers
file.comment: EconPapers is a user frontend to RepEc and provides access to the largest collection of preprints and discussion papers in economics.

file.name: EcoWin
file.comment: EcoWin provides financial and macroeconomic data together with powerful software applications. EcoWin offers instantaneous access to financial and macroeconomic information and analytics. Proprietary software tools permit clients to manipulate and analyse data and present it in an infinite variety of formats.

file.name: GGDC Dseries
file.comment: This site of the Groningen Growth and Development Centre presents series on measures of economic performance, which have been constructed by various GGDC researchers over the years.

file.name: Makrökonomie-Tutorium
file.comment: Makro-online ist ein Skript zur Einführung in die Makroökonomie (Teilgebiet der Volkswirtschaftslehre). Es richtet sich an Studentinnen und Studententen in den ersten Semestern an Berufsakademien, Fachhochschulen und Universitäten. Schlagwörter: Wirtschaftstheorie, Volkswirtschaftslehre, Makroökonomie, Lehrbuch, Skript

file.name: mikro online Tutorium
file.comment: mikro-online ist ein Skript zur Einführung in die Mikroökonomie (Teilgebiet der Volkswirtschaftslehre). Es richtet sich an Studentinnen und Studententen in den ersten Semestern an Berufsakademien, Fachhochschulen und Universitäten. Schlagwörter: Wirtschaftstheorie, Volkswirtschaftslehre, Mikroökonomie, Lehrbuch, Skript

file.name: OffenerHaushalt
file.comment: Auf der Webseite werden die komplexen Daten des Bundeshaushalts erschlossen und in offenen und wiederverwendbaren Datenformaten zugänglich gemacht. Der Bundeshaushalt kann in einer Baumstruktur erforscht werden. Dadurch wird der Zusammenhang und das Verhältnis von Haushaltseinzelposten zu den einzelnen Ressorts verständlich.Jeder einzelne Haushaltsposten hat eine eigene Internetadresse (URL). Dadurch lässt sich jeder Haushaltsposten verlinken, als Lesezeichen speichern und so referenzieren. Schlagworte: Bundesrepublik Deutschland, Bundeshaushaltsplan, Haushaltsplan / Bund, Finanzwissenschaft, öffentliche Finanzen, Steuern, Staatsausgaben

file.name: Sachverständigenrat Wirtschaft
file.comment: Der Sachverständigenrat zur Begutachtung der gesamtwirtschaftlichen Entwicklung ist ein Gremium der wissenschaftlichen Politikberatung. Der Sachverständigenrat wurde durch Gesetz im Jahre 1963 eingerichtet zur periodischen Begutachtung der gesamtwirtschaftlichen Entwicklung in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Der Rat hat die gesamtwirtschaftliche Lage und deren absehbare Entwicklung zu analysieren, er hat zu untersuchen, wie im Rahmen der marktwirtschaftlichen Ordnung gleichzeitig Stabilität des Preisniveaus, hoher Beschäftigungsstand und außenwirtschaftliches Gleichgewicht bei stetigem und angemessenem Wachstum gewährleistet werden können. Dem gesetzlichen Auftrag zufolge verfaßt und veröffentlicht der Rat jedes Jahr ein Jahresgutachten (Mitte November) und überdies, in besonderen Problemlagen oder nach Auftrag durch die Bundesregierung, Sondergutachten.

file.name: Statistisches Bundesamt Deutschland
file.comment: Grundlegende statistische Daten werden online angeboten. Im Verhältnis zu dem was ein "gut informierter Bürger" an statistischen Informationen schnell, umfassend und bedarfsgerecht aufbereitet an statistischen Daten benötigt jedoch ausgesprochen dürftig. Z.B. auch im Hinblick auf internationale Vergleichsdaten.

file.name: The New Palgrave Dictionary of Economics
file.comment: R. H. Inglis Palgrave's original Dictionary of Political Economy (18949), was a landmark in both publishing and economics, a liberal and scholarly overview of the whole sphere of economic thought in its day. In 2008, Palgrave Macmillan published The New Palgrave Dictionary of Economics, 2nd edition, edited by Steven N. Durlauf and Lawrence E. Blume. While some classic articles were retained, around 80% of the text was either entirely new or substantially rewritten to reflect the depth of change within the discipline between the editions. This new edition retains the inspiring tradition of bringing together the world's most influential economists writing in their own voice on their areas of expertise. Schlagworte: Wirtschaft, Volkswirtschaft, Wirtschaftstheorie, Lexikon, Enzyklopädie

file.name: The World Factbook
file.comment: The World Factbook web page provides basic geographic, socio-economic, and economic data for every country in the world. Compiled by the CIA and published every year. Be aware, however, that this is not a good source for historic information and comparing data across countries is time-consuming.

file.name: Institute for International Economics
file.comment: The Institute for International Economics is a private, nonprofit, nonpartisan research institution devoted to the study of international economic policy. Since 1981 the Institute has provided timely, objective analysis and concrete solutions to key international economic problems.

file.name: International Financial Architecture
file.comment: The financial crises of the 1990s have led to loud calls for reform of international financial institutions like the IMF and the World Bank. This is one of the main points of Globalization Critics. There is clearly a need to better delineate the responsibilities of these institutions, but, at the same time, their impact over the past fifty years has been enormous. The challenge is to devise effective reforms without "throwing out the baby with the bath water." Essential ideas are collected on this page of the International Economics Institute in Washington.

file.name: International Monetary Fund (IMF)
file.comment: The IMF is an international organization of 183 member countries, established to promote international monetary cooperation, exchange stability, and orderly exchange arrangements; to foster economic growth and high levels of employment; and to provide temporary financial assistance to countries to help ease balance of payments adjustment. The IMF, recently, has been severely critizised (f.e. by Joseph Stiglitz) for promoting a one-eyed-perspective of globalization in the interest of the financial business sectors of the major developed countries.

file.name: The Home Page of J. Orlin Grabbe
file.comment: The mission of The J. Orlin Grabbe Homepage is to inform and educate the general public regarding - the increasing use of the monetary system as a surveillance mechanism, thereby endangering or destroying political and financial freedom; -the political, technological, and economic forces behind this development (including the war on drugs and the growth of the national security state in the digital age); - the technologies of political control whereby governments practice the very things they condemn (including money-laundering, drug-dealing, and terrorism) and then (or in order to) invoke the same as justification for enslaving their citizens; - the technologies, political and economic understanding, and philosphical perspective that a sovereign individual needs to reverse the erosion of his own liberty in this hostile environment.

file.name: Tobin Tax Initiative
file.comment: This is the comprehensive information page about Tobin Tax Initiatives throughout the world. Tobin Taxes are excise taxes on cross-border currency transactions. Such taxes are intended to tame currency market volatility and restore national economic sovereignity. (The name Tobin Tax and the original concept derives from James Tobin, a Ph.D. Nobel-laureate economist at Yale University.)

file.name: Bank of Japan (English)
file.comment: The Bank of Japan's missions are to maintain price stability and to ensure the stability of the financial system, thereby laying the foundations for sound economic development. The Bank of Japan publishes a couple of reports and statistics on the Japanese economy.

file.name: Cabinet Office
file.comment: The Cabinet Office was established with the Prime Minister of Japan as its head within the Cabinet in January 2001 as part of a series of reforms of the central government ministeries and agencies to strengthen the functioning of the cabinet. It drafts plans and provides comprehensive coordination of cabinet policies from a level one step above the government agencies. The website informs about these activities.

file.name: Center Japan Economy Business CJEB
file.comment: Columbia University established the Center on Japanese Economy and Business at the Graduate School of Business in April 1986 under the direction of Professor Hugh Patrick. The central mission of the Center has been to enhance understanding of the Japanese and AsiaPacific economies and their business, financial and managerial systems. An important focus is on Japans international economic and business relationships in bilateral, AsiaPacific regional and global contexts.

file.name: Development Bank of Japan
file.comment: Development Bank of Japan (DBJ) provides long-term financing and other policy-based schemes to qualified projects as a supplement and inducement to the lending and other services provided by ordinary financial institutions. It publishes reseerach reports and monthly economic notes on the state of the Japanese economy.

file.name: Japan - Worldbank Country at a Glance
file.comment: Basic statistics on Japanese society and economy published by the World Bank.

file.name: Japan and the IMF
file.comment: A list of documents and publications of the International Monetary Fund on Japanese issues.

file.name: Japan Major Economic Indexes
file.comment: Linklist of the Japanese Information Network of statistical ressources on the Japanese Economy.

file.name: e-Publications
file.comment: Zielsetzung des Projektes, das von zwei Projektgruppen an der UB Potsdam und an der StUB Frankfurt/Main mit Unterstützung des Instituts für Wirtschaftsinformatik der Universität Frankfurt gemeinsam bearbeitet wird, ist es, zunächst eine Bestandsaufnahme und Bewertung gegenwärtiger Bezugsstrukturen von elektronischen Informationsressourcen (Datenbanken, E-Journals, Volltexte etc.) in Deutschland und ausgewählten Nachbarländern durchzuführen und darauf aufsetzend Modelle für eine künftige Bezugs- und Bereitstellungspraxis in der Bundesrepublik Deutschland zu entwickeln.

file.name: franck geistige werte
file.comment: Eine weitere Variation von Georg Franck zu den ökonomischen Grundbedingungen der Wissensgesellschaft.

file.name: Franck Oekonomie der Aufmerksamkeit
file.comment: Für Georg Franck ist Aufmerksamkeit der essentiell knappe Faktor der Informationsgesellschaft.

file.name: Insects on the Web
file.comment: This site aims to help you really see insects for the miniature marvels they represent and to understand how intertwined our cultures have become with these alien creatures.

file.name: berlin.de - Veranstaltungskalender
file.comment: Umfassende Datenbank Recherche im Veranstaltungskalender Berlin. Schlagworte: Veranstaltungsprogramm, Filmprogramm, Theaterprogramm, Opernprogramm, Literaturveranstaltungen, Museum, Ausstellungsprogramm, Berlin.

file.name: choices.de

file.name: kultiversum

file.name: Kunstsalon eV Köln
file.comment: Der KunstSalon ist eine Kölner Privatinitiative zur Förderung von Kunst und Kultur. Seit 1994 setzt sich der KunstSalon e.V. als gemeinnütziger Verein dafür ein, möglichst viele Menschen an die verschiedenen Künste heran zu führen, in der besonderen Atmosphäre eines aufwändig renovierten Fabriklofts die Künste zu genießen und sie in unterschiedlichsten Projekten zu fördern. All dies geschieht im Rahmen unserer monatlichen jours fixes, aber auch in zahlreichen Sonderveranstaltungen. schlagworte: Köln, Kultur, Musik, schauspiel, Theater, Oper, Film, Veranstaltungskalender

file.name: Literaturhaus Köln
file.comment: Das literarische veranstaltungsprogramm des Kulturhauses Köln. schlagworte: Köln, Kultur, Litertur, Veranstaltungskalender
